summary: The efforts of the Pakistani security forces in their fight against terrorism and how the lives of security officials are affected. A retired security officer returns to save Pakistan from a major terrorist attack.
cast: Shaan Shahid|Hamza Ali Abbasi|Shamoon Abbasi|Ayesha Khan|Meesha Shafi|Ali Azmat|Bilal Lashari|Kamran Lashari|Batin Farooqi|Uzma Khan
title: Waar
